#summary what do I need to install when I want to use the client
#labels Phase-Requirements
= Prerequisites =

To be able to run the RedmineClient application, you need to install .Net framework 4 ([http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=17851 Download])

On the Redmine server, the Rest api must be enabled.
(Administration -> Authentication -> Enable REST web service)
